text: Agadez Region is one of the seven regions of Niger. The regional capital is Agadez. As of the 2012 census, 487,620 people lived there. It has an area of . == Departments == There are six departments: * Aderbissina Department * Arlit Department * Bilma Department * Iferouane Department * In-Gall Department * Tchirozerine Department Category:Regions of Niger
title: Agadez Region
